original: Davidson, Erik Torsten, direktör, Alingsås, f. 1/10/81 i Borås ^ av fabr. David Svensson o. Laura Åkerlund. G. 1. 06 m. Ella Odqvisst, d. 15; 2. 19 m. Eva Hedenlund. Barn: Inga f. 08, Gösta 09, Birgit 11, Sture 12, Bertil 13, Gurli 15, Marianne 20, Andrea 25. —• Avg:ex. fr. Börås tekn. elemisk. 01, dito fr. Borås tekn. vävsk. 03. Stud :vistelse i Tyskl. 03-04. Tekn. ledare o. deläg. i A-B Wiskabergs Fabr. i Borås 04-30, ing. v. Almedahl-Dal-sjöfors A-B fabr. 30i-33, start, tills. m. disp. Nils Möller A-B Alingsås Siden-väveri 32, tekn. ledare f. detta föret. 32-40, verkst. dir. där sed. 40. Led. av byggnmd i Borås 08-30, led. av styr. f. Borås Sparbank 22-30. Medl. av Frimurarorden o. Götiska förb.
translated: Davidson, Erik Torsten, director, Alingsås, born October 1st, 1881 in Borås, son of factory worker David Svensson and Laura Åkerlund. Married first in 1906 to Ella Odqvisst until her death in 1915, then married Eva Hedenlund in 1919. Children: Inga (born 1908), Gösta (born 1909), Birgit (born 1911), Sture (born 1912), Bertil (born 1913), Gurli (born 1915), Marianne (born 1920), Andrea (born 1925). Graduated from Borås Technical High School in 1901 and from Borås Technical Weaving School in 1903. Completed a study period in Germany from 1903-1904. Became Technical Leader and Co-owner of A-B Wiskabergs Factory in Borås from 1904-1930, then Engineer for Almedahl-Dal-sjöfors A-B Factory from 1930-1933. Started Alingsås Silk Weaving Company together with Nils Möller in 1932 and was Technical Leader for this company until 1940, when he became Managing Director. Was a member of the Building Committee in Borås from 1908-1930 and a member of the Board of Borås Savings Bank from 1922-1930. Was a member of the Freemasons and the Götiska Förbundet.

structured.name: Erik Torsten Davidson
additionalName: Tekn. ledare o. deläg. i A-B Wiskabergs Fabr.
